abstract: With a little effort, you can look and feel pretty good.
description: Designed to increase the understanding of personal hygiene - this film show the importance of proper rest, diet and exercise to good health and appearance. Its also deals with the special problems teenage boys have regarding personal hygiene and the changes taking place in their maturing bodies.
